name: Searching For Love
description:
[ Play in FullScreen to fix the janky UI (mostly) ]
[ Made for the #WowieJam4 by Softzone ]
[Our First Game!]

[ Move with WASD, Interact with F, Select with SPACE ]

Welcome to Searching for Love, a game in which your decisions greatly impact your progression. 

Meet P.E.N.1, aka Penny, the AI, and see where the river of love takes you on the bumpy currents of fate as you hunt for treasure together.

Traverse your way through SIX exciting dialogue chains to reach one of multiple different endings!

- Supposed Tester - "It ain't much but I got a good chuckle."
- Made-up Guy - "A romantic rollercoaster that I can't stop playing!"
- A Close Friend- "Uhh... what happened to the UI?"

Music from: https://www.playonloop.com/royalty-free-music-style/16-bit/
Music Licence: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
